text: Na shcho den聞, lyudy lytsemira ta zhinky skazhut聞 tsym khto vvazhaly, 'Bud聞 "laska dozvol聞te nam pohlynuty deyake z vashoho svitla." Tse bude kazatysya, "Idete nazad pozadu vas, ta shukayete svitla." Bar'yer bude vstanovlyuvatysya mizh nymy, chyyi vorota vidokremlyuye myloserdya na vnutrishniy storoni, z retribution na zovnishniy storoni
